game

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Adapted from http://www.iforce2d.net/b2dtut/explosions Applies an impulse to a jBox2d Body inversely proportional to its distance away, to simulate something similar to an explosion.
    Since:
    2015-04-24
    Version:
    2015-04-24
    Author:
    Spencer Davis, Josh Kepros, Josh McDermott, Chris Swanson
